summary: A software developer becomes a billionaire and is distracted by fame, greed and power, then must save his invention and company from a hostile takeover.
cast: Ismael 'East' Carlo|Mia Farrow|Chris Howell|Elena Evangelo|John Light|Gustavo Ruiz|Ben Hernandez Bray|Jason Rodriguez|Megan Dodds|Shaun Majumder|Archie Kao|Paul Reiser|Jeffrey Donovan|Zachary Kranzler|Peter Coyote|Concetta Tomei|Hal Holbrook|R.J. Chambers|Ian Bagg|Arj Barker|Amy Turner|Michael Bailey Smith|Kaarina Aufranc|Sydney Bennett|Catherine McCord|Rob Brownstein|Heidi Heller|Rueben Grundy|John Balma|Billie Myers|Robert Hegyes|Jesse James Chisholm|Jack Stehlin|Gloria Koehn Straube|Greg Bronson
director: Director: Alan Ari Lazar (as Alan Lazar)
title: Purpose
